RelatedSentence: ACCORDING to the pro-opposition Syrian Observatory for Human Rights , three civilians - a child and two women - were killed and 10 others were wounded during a military air strike targeting alleged anti-government militants in the town of Da'el in Syria 's Deraa governorate on 14 May .
Casualty figures provided by the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights can not be independently verified but have been assessed to be the most reliable .
